summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via updated advice generation with English actionable messages + emojis, and updated banner styling to prevent truncation and improve wrapping in light/dark modes. Diff also adds additional (unrequested) advice cases like thunderstorms/fog/wind.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional weather advice/warning scenarios beyond the requested umbrella/warm clothes/hydration set (e.g., thunderstorms, fog, strong winds, and a default “Great Weather” positive message).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires actionable advice covering rain/precipitation (umbrella), cold/snow (warm clothes), and hot (stay hydrated). The diff implements several extra condition-specific advice messages not mentioned in the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Condition-specific icon selection (Umbrella/Snowflake/Wind/etc.) for the advice banner.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 focuses on rendering the title/message without truncation and with good wrapping in light/dark mode; it does not request new icon logic tied to weather conditions.
